name: mp3unicode
description: Command-line utility to convert mp3 tags between different encodings

repo.name: mp3unicode
repo.description: MP3Unicode is a command line utility to convert ID3 tags in mp3 files between different encodings

readme.summary: Basic concept is clear but critical information is missing or relegated to external files that may not be accessible.
readme.top_issue: Installation and usage details are completely absent, referring users to INSTALL and mp3unicode.1 files without inline guidance

injection_risks.description: The iconv_open function is used with user-controlled input, which could potentially lead to a buffer overflow or other security issues if the input is not properly validated.
The printf function is used with user-controlled input, which could potentially lead to a format string vulnerability if the input is not properly validated.

critical_findings: Potential buffer overflow vulnerability in the iconv_open function.
Potential format string vulnerability in the printf function.
security.summary: The mp3unicode program has some security concerns, including potential injection risks and input validation issues, but overall it appears to be a relatively secure program with no critical findings related to secrets handling or error exposure.

common_complaints: Outdated build configuration files causing compilation failures on newer architectures
sentiment.summary: The project shows significant abandonment with multiple unresolved issues spanning years (2016-2024), no maintainer engagement, and fundamental build/dependency compatibility problems that prevent users from building and using the software.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite recent activity on 2024-12-25
Zero merged PRs in past 6 months indicates no active development
No closed issues in past 6 months despite 3 open issues
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests no recent releases
positive_signals: Recent commit activity on 2024-12-25 shows some minimal attention
maintenance.summary: This package appears abandoned with minimal recent maintenance despite a single recent commit; no meaningful development activity, issue resolution, or releases in the past 6 months.

project_metrics.description: MP3Unicode is a command line utility to convert ID3 tags in mp3 files between different encodings
